message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think a fair price for this product is $110. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100?
I'm glad we're close, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $105, but I'm not going any lower than that. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $102?
